companies.title: Studio Member
companies.description: Worked on a small team with other Stanford undergraduates to design a platform to engage millennials with high impact charities. Responsibilities included: Coordinating the need-finding stage using design thinkingConducting and synthesizing user interviews

companies.title: Marketing Intern
companies.description: NurtureList is an early-stage startup based in San Francisco that connects parents with preschool and daycare providers. As a marketing intern, I worked closely with the founder to aggressively expand NurtureList's network of providers in California.+ Spearheaded marketing outreach through cold calling campaigns -Managed multi-stage sales funnels and contributed to an overall 11% increase in provider sign- ups -Developed scripts and protocol for targeting different types of daycares -Used insights gleaned from campaigns to make suggestions for new product features and improvements + Contributed to content marketing strategy by creating content for the NurtureList blog with SEO optimization techniques

companies.title: Intern in Epigenetics & Chromatin Dynamics Laboratory
companies.description: Utilized various computational threading algorithms and extensive statistical analysis to create first structural model for Protein NUPR1a, published in the Journal of Molecular ModelingExamined structural and biophysical properties of protein NUPR1 and its role in cancer using Accelrys Discovery Studio VisualizerConducted Molecular Dynamics simulations using molecular mechanics to visualize structure and behavior of NUPR1
